Articles.Content:
True.... very very true....... *as it is trying to get back out of the garbage can it fell in*

The person below me is geographically above me. (Ooooooo thats a tough one! Hint: I'm at bout 278 m AMSL)

Probably.

The person below me has a Windows computer.

Of course.

The person below me currently has over 50 posts.

False, the forum thinks I only have 2 or 3 for some reason.

The person below me has a Mac.

False, Windows 8.

The person below me hates Windows (the OS).

Somewhat true. I don't really like Windows 8, but I am fine with 7.

The person below me has used a Linux.

True, I kinda like Linux, but the one thing holding me back from it is that it seems that most games are not really designed to run on non-Windows platforms.

The user below me is using Chrome.

Yes.

The person below me has played KSP since 0.8.

False. .10

The person below me has a heavily modded KSP.

True and false. I have 3 installs. Heavy, light and vanilla

The person below me has a heavily modded Skyrim

True 50 Gigs and counting!

The person below me wears boots daily.

False.

The person below me lost at least 800 posts and threads during the Internet Catastrophe of April 2013.

Edited April 22, 2013 by Designer225

False, but I did have bout 600, so close

(And since you two doubled up, True, I only wear boots. The military lifestyle kinda sticks)

The person below me has flung a craft in KSP in a single orbit around Kerbin and landed perfectly back on the pad (with de-orbit aiming of at least half the planet away)

True! A lot harder then it sounds.

The person below me has dyed their hair.

Yep, the last time I did it was a little after never

The person below me likes pancakes.

I don't have to complain, do I?

The person below me is COMPLETELY unhappy about the Internet Catastrophe of April 2013.

YOU %#$%@$@#%@^@# skippy I am.

The person below me knows what a Furby is.
true. The user below me has made an Eve ascent vehicle.

True, you never said it had to actually ascend.

User below me has drawn pictures of design ideas for KSP.

Nope!

The user below me lives south of the Equator.
false. The user below me lives in Canada.

No, California.

The user below me have visited Mun.

True, many times.

The user below me will have not visited Eeloo.

False, I've placed a base on it. The Gamma (base) series never fails to land on anything. 17 times and counting.

The user below me has never made a base.

False. I love building bases.

The user below me has a blocky and square avatar.
